segments.text: May I take your drink order while you are looking over your menu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , do you have a wine list ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The wine list is on the second page of your menu .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have mixed drinks in this restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have a full bar here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not sure what I want . Do you have any house specials ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , we are famous for our Cuervo Gold margaritas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good ! Please bring me one of those .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like that drink blended or on the rocks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like it with salt or no salt ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like my margarita with no salt , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
